login-select-method.title: MyIRMA login
login-select-method.intro-par1: This is the MyIRMA website of the Privacy by Design Foundation. Using this website you can view the activities of your IRMA app, and block or delete your account.
login-select-method.intro-par2: The foundation knows when your IRMA app is used, but does not know where or with what information. In this way a combination of security and privacy is pursued. The MyIRMA usage log allows you to check if your IRMA app is being abused. If so, you can block your IRMA app here.
login-select-method.login-methods: Below you can log in to MyIRMA in two ways:
login-select-method.login-method-irma: Using IRMA, by scanning a QR code with the IRMA app; this is the easiest way.
login-select-method.login-method-email: Using the email address with which you registered. If you enter it below a link will be sent to it that will allow you to log in to MyIRMA. You can use this login method when you do not have your phone with you, or if your phone has been stolen and you want to prevent abuse of your IRMA app.
login-select-method.check-email-text: Log in by clicking on the link that has been sent to your email address.

login-select-candidate.title: Choose IRMA account
login-select-candidate.explanation: The email address with which you are logging in is associated to multiple IRMA accounts, which are shown in the table below. The columns mean the following:
login-select-candidate.candidates-item-1: Your IRMA username. You can find this in your IRMA app when you login to MyIRMA.
login-select-candidate.candidates-item-2: Time of the most recent usage of this IRMA account.

login-email-sent.title: Check your email
login-email-sent.explanation: Log in by clicking on the link that has been sent to your email address.

login-registration-verified.title: MyIRMA registration finished
login-registration-verified.explanation: Your email address has been linked to your IRMA app successfully.
login-registration-verified.app-is-ready: Your IRMA app is now ready for further usage.

logs.header: View usage of your IRMA app

logs-events.PIN_CHECK_BLOCKED: PIN wrong too often, blocked {{param}} seconds

emails.explanation: The following email addresses are associated to your account. You can login on MyIRMA using each of these addresses. If you have already <0>loaded your email address as IRMA card</0> you can associate it to your account using the button below.
emails.no-email-addresses: There are no email addresses associated to your account. This means that you will not be able to log in on MyIRMA and block your cards, in case you lose your phone.

delete-account.explanation-par1: If you delete your MyIRMA account, all your cards become permanently unusable, and all events as well as your email address will be permanently deleted.
delete-account.explanation-par2: <0>Warning:</0> Blocking or deleting your MyIRMA account is permanent! If you want to use IRMA again afterwards you will have to re-register at MyIRMA and re-obtain all your cards.
delete-account.alert-explanation: If you proceed, all your cards will become permanently unusable, and your logs and email address will be deleted from MyIRMA. Are you certain?
